siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: PowerRouter is a powerful and easy way to route sales leads to the right salesperson in Salesforce with smart rules you setup in advance. You can build lead/contact distribution rules 10x faster without writing any code.
blogPost.body: PowerRouter is a powerful and easy way to route sales leads to the right salesperson in Salesforce with smart rules you setup in advance. You can build lead/contact distribution rules 10x faster without writing any code.
blogPost.title: PowerRouter - Route your Salesforce leads 10x faster
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: PowerRouter是一种强大而简单的方法，可以通过您事先设置的智能规则将销售线索路由到Salesforce中的正确销售人员。您可以在不编写任何代码的情况下，以10倍的速度建立销售线索/联系人分配规则。
localize.tagline: 将您的Salesforce销售线索路由速度提高10倍

localize.description: PowerRouter是一種強大而簡單的方法，可以通過您事先設置的智能規則將銷售線索路由到Salesforce中的正確銷售人員。您可以在不編寫任何代碼的情況下，以10倍的速度建立銷售線索/聯繫人分配規則。
localize.tagline: 將您的Salesforce銷售線索路由速度提高10倍

previous.excerpt: Save time with an online editor that has a simple, intuitive drag & drop interface and 1000+ ready-made UI components. https://shuffle.dev/
previous.title: Shuffle - An online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and more!

localize.description: 使用在线编辑器节省时间，它有一个简单、直观的拖放界面和1000多个现成的UI组件。https://shuffle.dev/。
使用在線編輯器節省時間，它有一個簡單、直觀的拖放界面和1000多個現成的UI組件。https://shuffle.dev/。

next.excerpt: Covalent helps remote teams build better bonds through interactive, online icebreakers. Getting started is easy: (1) Find a friend and visit our website (2) Press on "Start Bonding" in the top, right-hand corner (3) Press "Host" then "Play"
next.title: Covalent - Interactive icebreakers for remote teams

localize.description: Covalent通过互动式在线破冰，帮助远程团队建立更好的联系。开始很简单：(1)找到一位朋友并访问我们的网站(2)按右上角的 "开始连接"(3)按 "主机 "然后按 "播放"。
Covalent通過互動式在線破冰，幫助遠程團隊建立更好的聯繫。開始很簡單：(1)找到一位朋友並訪問我們的網站(2)按右上角的 "開始連接"(3)按 "主機 "然後按 "播放"。
